desc: Madewell Products makes golf ball retrievers for the golf industry. Our Ranger and Original Bag Shag are popular on the driving range.

layout.text: "Never bend down to pick up another golf ball again!"

The Original BAG SHAG® makes golf practice easy, simple and fast by improving practice time. It is the only product of its kind that is MADE IN THE USA and comes with a 5 Year Guarantee. Don't settle for less than the Original!!!
